name: Near Side Of Yonder
description:
Near Side of Yonder is a 3D, third-person adventure, where the player has to explorar stellar system and find all the secrets within so he can fight the stars themselves to absorb their energy and be able to create his own star system, with life.

Discover stellar systems by flying from one to another and discover the secrets and beings held inside. Fight a star incarnated as a boss to absorb its vital energy.

Talk to distant planets and engage in emotional conversations.

Fly in space in a mesmerizing experience!

Keep in mind our game is best played with a controller.

Have fun and enjoy our demo,

By tHEtIP studios.
